title: Taihei Ueda
text:
(born 3 March 1982 in <a href="Fukuoka">Fukuoka</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>) is a <a href="Japanese%20people">Japanese</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. Ueda has played six <a href="Test%20match%20%28rugby%20union%29">international matches</a> for the <a href="Japan%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Japan national rugby union team</a>.
Ueda was a member of the Japan team at the <a href="2011%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2011 Rugby World Cup</a>, playing one match against eventual winners <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">the All Blacks</a>.
 Ueda plays for <a href="Top%20League">Top League</a> team <a href="Honda%20Heat">Honda Heat</a>.
